transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello ji sir aawaz aa rahi hai aapko?
Customer: Haan haan ji.
Executive: Ji ji. So isme sir kya hota hai jaise aapko 17 bylead mili hai right? Ab sir hum khud itna agree kar rahe hain ki isme se sir aath se aapki jo bylead hongi wo kharab hongi. Kharab in the sense wo bolenge ki humne check kiya hai, hume abhi nahi chahiye. Wo aisa bolenge sir lekin unko chahiye hota hai. Lekin reason behind kya hota hai sir ye India hai aap bhi jante hain sir ek customer jab tak 10 jagah check nahi karega wo aise maal nahi lega India mein. Ye cheez sir aap jante hain. Right? To hume sir daily basis pe 17 ki sorry ek week mein 17 ki 17 bylead consume karna rahega. To hume sir thoda sa usme se conversion nikalega.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Ji. To ek month mein agar hamare paas bylead ka agar quota dekhe to 65 rehta hai plus. To sir agar 65 ke 65 hum consume karte hain tab usme se sir bylead hamari convert hoti hai.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: To usme aap keh rahe hain ki 90% false hai wo sir reason ye rehta hai ki agar koi bhi person ne bylead dali aur jaldi se kisi ne unko requirement ke liye call kar liya to wo waha pe convert ho jata hai. Jaise hum agar 50% ki baat kare to char ghante ke baad wale pe connect hue hain aur 50% bylead pe zero to four hour wali consume ki hai.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Samjhe sir? To aage se sir kya kariye aap zero to four hour wali zyada focus kariye aur abhi hume samay nahi hua hai. Abhi sir hamara listing banegi visibility banegi tabhi sir hume aur call aana start hongi jaise jaise hum bylead consume karenge. Fir hamara sir ye zyada achcha better rahega. Aur dusri cheez sir jo aap not relevant mark kar rahe hain wo sir apni hi category mein mark kar rahe hain aap. Maine us din bhi aapko discussion kiya tha. To apni hi category mein sir mark nahi karna hai.
Customer: Nahi nahi apni category nahi hai abhi jahan se karu.
Executive: Abhi hai.
Customer: Nahi maine ji pehle pehle pehle dhyan se suno fir category jo hai yahi to problem hamare system mein hai jo tumko fix karna hai. Ab jo maine mark kiya tha jo pouches hote hain na pouch jisme masala fill hota hai.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Theek hai? Main wo pouch hi sell karta tha main masala sell karta hu. Theek hai? Main masale ko pouch mein fill karta hu apna brand mein fill karta hu. To wo jo inquiry thi wo pouch ki inquiry thi.
Executive: Wo only pouch ki thi.
Customer: Haan. Kisi ko pouch chahiye tha 500 kilo. To main pouch banata nahi hu to main kya kaam kiya.
Executive: Ji right.
Executive: Ab usme sir aapko kya karna hai jaise sirf pouch ki aa rahi hai to usme aap specification mein aap jaiye aur usme uska feed kar dijiye ki I am do not deal in this specific pouch. To is tarah se sir aap mark kariye. Matlab apni hi category mein mark nahi karna hai.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Aur second jo aapka bylead maine discussion kiya hai aana start ho gayi hai aapko sahi bhi aayengi aisa nahi hai ki ekdum se sir fake hi aayengi sab. Ek do jo log hoti hain sir char panch log wo aisa bolenge ki humne sirf check kiya hai. To hume sir daily basis pe consume karne ki zarurat hai.
Customer: Right.
Executive: To yaha pe aapka jo concern raise hua hai wo main usko abhi close kar raha hu sir. To aapke paas ek feedback mail aayega hum dono ke beech mein jo bhi baat hua hai wo uske regarding rehta hai feedback. To aap yes yes satisfied ka aayega wo yes satisfied aap de dena right?
Customer: Ji sir.
Executive: Ji baki aapko koi bhi issue ho aap whatsapp number hai mera mera direct call kariye sir. Maine aapko number bhi iske liye provide karaya hai sir.
Customer: Ji in future mein jaise kabhi bhi ho.
Executive: Ji aur wo export ka kya hua sir aapne le liya kya waha se?
Customer: Haan wo le liya.
Executive: Haan maine wahi bataya tha sir ye foreign ki wali jo thi isiliye aapko kam di jati hain 10 lead isiliye kam di jati hain. Domestic ki bylead aapko zyada isiliye di jati hain. Theek hai? To main concern close kar raha hu aur feedback de dena guys.
Customer: Theek hai okay.
Executive: Okay okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer received irrelevant buyleads.

- Customer marking not relevant in same category.

- Export buyleads are less.



Resolution:

- Executive explained how to mark irrelevant buyleads.

- Executive explained the reason for less export buyleads.

- Executive closed the concern.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to provide feedback.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, category, export, feedback
